events.message: The policyholder reported a car collision that occurred at an intersection on 2024-03-09 around 6 PM. The vehicle sustained front-end damage.
Claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to descriptions of vehicle damage and impact from collision.
Agent Michelle Lopez has been assigned to manage this automobile accident claim for prompt assistance and follow-up.
An official acknowledgment message was sent to the customer confirming receipt and initiation of claim processing.
Request made for police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and insurance policy documents to proceed with investigation.
The customer has submitted all requested documents including the police report and vehicle photos within the specified timeframe.
Internal investigation commenced to verify details of the automobile accident and assess claim validity.
Investigation completed successfully confirming the claim's legitimacy and extent of the damages described.
A settlement offer was drafted and sent to the claimant outlining the compensation amount for vehicle repairs.
The customer responded favorably to the proposed settlement, expressing appreciation for the timely service and clear communication.
Following feedback, the claim was formally approved with the agreed settlement terms confirmed for payment issuance.
Insurance payment was processed and issued directly to the repair shop to cover the costs as per the settlement.
The insurance claim case has been successfully closed after full payment and resolution confirmation from the customer.
All documents and communications related to the auto accident claim were archived in the system for future reference.
